    【Kyoka Himekaido】

    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_HIY01ga")

    【Hiyu】

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0008.wav")

    【????】
 "Hold on, Erika Ikusa!" ]])
    -- //リラの騎士

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｅ×いっぱい

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0420.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "You all are... Lira-san’s" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ On the way to the cafeteria, Lira-san’s 'Knights' stood in our path. ]])

    MSG([[ Their faces showed displeasure, openly hostile toward me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "We don’t know what means you used, but we’re not satisfied with those Princess Election results!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "Your appeal wasn’t 'fashion' at all! It’s absolutely wrong for Princess Lira to lose!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "You must’ve pulled strings behind the scenes, you cheater!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san’s 'Knights' spoke with tears in their eyes. That much sadness shows how much they mourn Lira not becoming 'Princess'. ]])

    MSG([[ I thought it was touching that she was blessed with such loyal 'Knights.' Still, I clearly told them the facts. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0421.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I think Lira-san would say this: the results are everything." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0422.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Anything more said would only hurt Lira-san’s pride. Let’s stop now—the Princess Election is over." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "I-it’s not over! Princess Lira’s fashion was unreal! If you admit cheating and concede—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "You want to know why Lira lost, huh<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //エルメス

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0423.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-you are—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

-- //BU：エルメス（通常）、ダリア（通常）、モブ女子生徒Ｅ×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-500,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,300,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB08aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB08aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB08aa")

    MSG([[ Hermes and Daria walked toward us from the large auditorium. ]])

    MSG([[ Ignoring our panic at the sudden arrival of the 'Princesses', Hermes calmly continued speaking. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Fighting like this isn’t cute, so I’ll explain instead<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "To put it simply, Lira’s fashion was a little off from what everyone wanted<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "O-off from what Princess Lira was supposed to show...? W-what does that mean?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "You said it yourself—fashion nobody had seen before! Lira’s look this time was more mature and amazing<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "But was that really what everyone wanted from Lira? They might think it’s 'amazing', but not 'cute'." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "U-um..." ]])

    MSG([[ With Hermes verbalizing it, I realized the cause of my discomfort about Lira’s fashion. ]])

    MSG([[ I see. Lira’s fashion wasn’t tied to the established image of a 'Princess Gal'. ]])

    MSG([[ Unlike me reenacting the incident that gained me popularity, hers was a completely opposite kind of appeal. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Lira’s fashion sense is outstanding. Her style will likely take hold gradually." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "But for this Princess Election, it wasn’t suitable. She was supported on stage for her usual 'Princess Gal' style." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "The adult impression of her fashion took time to fit in. Compared to Erika, who stuck to a 'Battle Princess' appeal, the difference was clear." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I think Lira knew that too. She must know so many fashions that shine on a stage like the Princess Election." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, -400, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Maybe... she thought she needed a flashy appeal even if it meant changing herself<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0424.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Changing herself..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was newly reminded of how amazing Lira is. ]])

    MSG([[ As Hermes said, if she prepared the previously popular fashion for the Princess Election, she could have played it safe. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet she stood on that stage in a totally new style. ]])

    MSG([[ I, still timid, could never imitate that. Truly someone I can respect. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0425.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Everyone, sorry to interrupt. I’ve decided I won’t attend the victory celebration after all." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0426.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Because I want to meet and have a proper talk with Lira-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Good good~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Such a cute idea! Knowing Lira, she’s probably somewhere having a one-person reflection meeting right now!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,400,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Maybe she’s somewhere girls don’t usually go?" ]])

    MSG([[ A place girls don’t approach and Lira knows. There’s only one place possible. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0427.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you, Daria-san, Hermes-san!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：ヒユ（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,500,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB06aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB07aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB08aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_MOB09aa")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Don’t worry about us! Erika Onee-sama is straightforward once she gets an idea... really wonderful~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(80,"")

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｅ×いっぱい
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-300,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB08aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB08aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB08aa")

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "W-wait!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0428.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As I tried to head somewhere, Lira-san’s 'Knights' stopped me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "S-sorry for the weird accusations. Hermes and the others explained things... now I’ve finally sorted it out in my head." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira-knight_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Gal-style Student】
 "Congratulations on winning the Princess Election. Please take care of our Princess... Erika-hime." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0429.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...Yes, I will take care of her." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I bowed to the 'Knights' who lowered their heads, then headed properly toward Lira-san. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")

    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：男子部校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Running full speed, I found her just where expected—in front of the boys' dorm area, where girls usually don't go— ]])

    PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

    --//BU：リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Lira-san stood alone, absentmindedly touching her clothes. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0208.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "...So maybe this hoodie was too flashy. Or maybe the top is the real problem. The knit might have looked a bit like a college girl." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0209.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Damn... too many issues. Crap, I messed up big time on the stage I admired. This sucks." ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t catch everything clearly, but Lira was muttering and questioning herself. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as Hermes said, she was holding a one-person reflection meeting. ]])

    MSG([[ I hesitated to speak but finally mustered the courage to call out. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01hb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0430.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Lira-san. Thank goodness you haven’t left yet." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0210.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "E-Erika? What’s wrong?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0431.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "The Princess Election is over. I want to have an honest talk." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0211.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Honest? Ah... I get it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0212.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Okay, got it. I’ll give you something good, check your phone." ]])

    --//SE：LIENの通知音
PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0432.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh, RINE? Now?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0213.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Just look at it. This is my way of closure." ]])

    MSG([[ A contact from Lira appeared on social media. It included an image file. ]])

    MSG([[ I checked the image and was shocked. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0433.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-this photo..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It showed a freckled young girl about early elementary school age. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0214.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ugly, right~? That’s me before makeup and fashion, back when I was bullied." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0215.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "...I spread your disgraceful photos. You have the right to spread my past in return." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0216.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "That image? Do whatever you want—edit it, burn it, meme it, whatever." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0434.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-if you do that, it will ruin Lira-san’s reputation!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0217.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "...It's okay. I’m used to that kind of stuff." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira operated her phone and showed me another photo. ]])

    MSG([[ It was a drawing of a girl in a shiny dress, like a child’s drawing. Probably drawn by a child. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0218.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Funny, huh? That was my ideal dress I drew long ago." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0219.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "One day at school, copies of that drawing were posted everywhere. It even got online. I was terribly bullied." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

--;吉★　テキスト修正「描いてのが」→「描いてんのが」（2020/01/31）
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0220.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "They hated me for being ugly and drawing weird pictures. No matter how much I complained or asked for help, no one helped." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0435.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s terrible...! How could people do that!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Those were far worse than my secret photo scandal. And while Hiyu and others backed me, Lira had no one. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t even imagine the pain. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0221.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Sorry. I’m not trying to brag. I wanted to tell you that I did to you what I hated when I was younger." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0222.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I’m really the worst. Unless someone suffers the same, I can’t feel at peace." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0223.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "That’s why I want you to spread my photos too. It’ll clear your mind, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0436.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was surprised by her unexpected request. But spreading photos is already impossible. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0437.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sorry... I already deleted it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0224.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "What!? Why!? Were you even listening!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira hastily grabbed my phone to check the photo folder. It was truly deleted; no sign of it. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s also deleted from social media; unless Lira sends it again, it can’t be retrieved. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if she sent it, I wouldn't accept it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0438.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "There’s no need for revenge, right? You never ordered secret photos to be taken." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0439.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I think you’re just taking responsibility for your 'Knights' acting on their own." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Lira’s eyes widened. I was sure my guess was right. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0225.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "W-what evidence do you have for that..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0440.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "The evidence is you telling the truth now, after the election." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0441.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "There’s no benefit to you now. There’s only one reason why." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "To settle the incident so no one investigates in the future." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0226.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "...!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira fell silent, obviously hit where it hurts. ]])

    MSG([[ Thank goodness. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira mocked me for overly positive interpretations, but maybe what I always thought is true. ]])
